website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional pocket radio; slim and highly portable with commendable sound quality and decent reception.
pros: Notable for its drift-free PLL synthesized tuning that's powerful enough to pick up even distant channels
Features auto station scanning and can save up to 19 preset stations
cons: Sits on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Quality brand, defective unit
customer_reviews.text: I needed a radio for hiking, bonfies, etc and I heard great things about this one. Wel, I guess I was wrong. It stopped scanning on the FM channel the first time I turned it off and then back on. And the next day it was stuck in headphone mode, so there’s no audio from the internal speaker (despite the 3-way switch being in the correct position). I know Sangean makes quality products, I’m guessing I just got a dud radio. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: B.T. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pocket radio
customer_reviews.text: I normally go cheap on things like this and end up disappointed. So this time I spent a little more and I am glad I did. This radio gets excellent reception and the stereo sound is great even with my impaired hearing. But note that I replaced the included earphones with my Apple earphones, which provide much better sound. The electronic tuning works well, and I appreciate the lock switch, which prevents the controls from being activated accidentally. The size and weight of the radio is perfect for my shirt pocket. The batteries last a long time if you use the earphones. Overall, this is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: jdibella

customer_reviews.title: Not a favorite anymore
customer_reviews.text: This little radio is okay, but there are problems in its design. When a "favorite" station is entered so the listener can return quickly to a station that is regularly chosen, there is no way to remove that setting. So, if you chose not to listen to that station anymore or if you're in a different part of the country, you cannot delete the setting. After time, you have too many "favorites" selected for the feature to be of any value. Another problem: Unless a station's frequency is strong, that station is not heard clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  W

customer_reviews.title: POOR PUBLICITY INFORMATION
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with the radio as I am not able to tune in to AM radio stations in Australia. The tuning only goes up/down by a factor of "10", not by a factor of "1". This means that i cannot tune in AM radio stations like 891, 972, 11323, 1395, etc. The Publicity information about the Sangean DT-200X did not say anything about this, If if did, I would not have bought it and looked for something else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The headphone wires that come with this radio disintegrated after one use, making the headphone unusable
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pocket Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio, very good reception on FM/FM Stereo. Good AM DXer at night. Simple controls nothing to confusing. I'm a senior and I caught on quickly. The favorite station portion of the radio is excellent, you can save both bands to the memory 19 available memory settings. I would recommend this radio without reserve. I decided to purchase this radio after watching the excellent review by Toddenbert on UTUBE many thanks to him for his comprehensive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: TCG

customer_reviews.title: Great reception!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend so he could listen to it while working. He says it gets great reception and is easy to find channels. I also bought some earbuds that have the over-ear hook. He wears gloves in his job so if they fall out he would have to stop, take off his gloves, put it back in his ears then re-glove, not to mention they may fall into something that would not be too nice... The size is perfect! He puts it in the inside pocket of his scrubs and it is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kbam

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY RADIO (4. 5 out of 5 Stars)
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews are right. I am satisfied with this little radio. Great FM reception (mono and stereo), middle of the road AM reception, good sound (bass booster bonus), perfect station pre-setting (great favorites feature), great battery life, added antenna that plugs into headphone jack, surprisingly excellent headphones, and a solid build. For a radio this small it's a good buy. Overall I'd give the radio an 8.5 out of 10. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: F. Poff

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to talk radio as I work outside. I live in a rural area with poor reception. This radio is great. It doesn't eat batteries like my other pocket radios. They don't usually last more than a few days. I've haven't yet had to replace batteries and it's been 2 weeks. At night I pull in far away stations. It has a very convenient clip. The volume is pretty loud. I'm thinking of getting a spare. Kind of expensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: roslyn landau chapo

customer_reviews.title: Best value for quality!
customer_reviews.text: AA batteries not weakling aaa batts.Not over complicated like most others.Speaker good.Sturdy .Easy station lock.Favorite station button good.Easy to read. Worth the extra 15.00 for this one is a winner. Going to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L

customer_reviews.title: Sound on FM is great & better than most on AM
customer_reviews.text: Right now I could find the Sangean 200RX online at Amazon; don't get any RX less at a big box store. I listen to a lot of AM as well & it was better than any other pocket radio. This little pocket radio is full of features- some have become important whereas at first I never thought i'd need. I can "lock" my selections keeping it on my selections whereby when I move or walk with it, it will not waiver to other stations etc. Younger people say I could listen to my phone in the same way. But I really rather carry my phone in my purse, not run my phone battery down, etc
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Reception! Volume Problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the radio in May 2018. Loved it. Great reception. I live among hills and 30 miles from town and still great reception. However in October, the volume decreased. Now I have to turn up the radio all the way just to hear it. This is disappointing as warranty is only 90 days. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: James Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Overall, works well, but you need to read the instruction manual first.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily keep the Sangean DT-200X in my bathroom, but it also works well as a portable radio (with removable belt clip). The AM/FM reception is pretty good. The digital tuning & memory presets are useful, for quickly switching between stations. I power it with 2 x AA Eneloop rechargeable batteries, and no problems so far. My only complaint is that you have to read the instruction manual carefully, because the buttons/controls aren't intuitively labeled. For example, the memory set button is called "Memo", but the memory tuning button is called "My Favorites". Consistent labels & terms - like "Memory" & "Memory Tuning" - would have made more sense.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Perform Well for Us
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as the radio does not work well in our home. The reviews we read were mostly favorable and we were anticipating a great radio. The AM station is full of static and the volume is low even on the highest setting. The FM station is okay, but the volume is still a problem. Perhaps it is our home, but this radio does not work well for us. We will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Renee54

customer_reviews.title: It is okay but there are some better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: A good quality radio that has nice sound quality verses the value. It did have some channel receiving issues and tried to send it back but Amazon worked things out and reimbursed me and told me to keep it due to shipping was higher than what the radio was worth so I fixed it with some soldering and using it as a weather back up radio when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chet S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Pocket Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pocket radio. It receives a lot of radio stations and the sound quality is fairly good for the size of the speaker. I like the digital tuner and the dial volume. Sound quality good when using headphones. I've had enough cheap pocket radios to appreciate the quality of this radio. There are better radios out there, but you have to pay a lot more for them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely love it. Then I dropped it into the bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, and absolutely loved it. Then I dropped it into the bathtub. I understood that it was dead, and threw it away. Three days later, for some unknown reason, I took it out of the trash, inserted batteries, and fired it up. It works perfectly! I'm not saying that this is waterproof. But I am saying that I am one happy consumer!!
customer_reviews.author: FreeBird

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I like radios. I collect radios. And this one is my favorite. The DT-200X does everything you would want--correctly and without complications. The sound is excellent for its size and power. And it's my throwback to olden days when I would go to the park on a summer day, eat my lunch and listen to the ballgame for an hour. I'd forgotten how easy heaven can be. Thanks Sangean and thanks Amazon (for a product I could never have found on my own).
customer_reviews.author: W. Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: about time
customer_reviews.text: love this radio! wanted to find my not so local station, dialed it in, bingo! clear as a bell!build quality is fantastic as well as the size.would like an am pm feature. flat bottom would be nice!a little more volume output,even with my good earbuds. earphones that come with it are comical! you may as well try to put a frisbee in your ear! button detent on all of them are top notch.just getting used to features, having a good time learning this little diamond in the rough!
customer_reviews.author: BANGER

customer_reviews.title: Among the best out there at any price
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've purchased... Only because I lost the other two. I purchased many Sangean radios over the years and I can tell you they certainly are a cut and above whatever else is out there. This compact one is just as good if not better than any other one i have come across and at a price that is definitely worth the money. I really love the number of channels you can program and the weather channel pick up is actually pretty sensitive to my surprise. Highly recommend this or any other Sangean radio
customer_reviews.author: Nick D. Nicklas

customer_reviews.title: Overall feature rich and good sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than my previous Sony Walkman S2. It’s about the same size, so it’s easy to carry and fit it your pockets. I love having a speaker if you don’t have or want headphones all the time. Reception is OK to good but leaving the headset cord in does improve the reception greatly for most stations. I also like it automatically turns off after 90 minutes - which save the battery life. Also has lots of channel you can program into memory
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Nice small radio for office
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good value for the money. I wish it was always clear and not a lot of stations come in but ok with a main Christian station. It does eat batteries but overall it does the job. I did buy the antennae and it helps some. Thanks for the fast shipment! I've use this for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: The radio worked great for three days and then nothing. I changed batteries twice but to no avail. I tried everything to get it working but I could not. I will be sending it back. Bill Have somehow got the radio to work. I do have to take batteries out when not in use. I've decided to keep the radio .
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: A simple and rugged radio for the briefcase or toolbag
customer_reviews.text: I keep this radio in my laptop case to have a radio where ever my work takes me, usually to medical clinics and hospitals. Having a radio that can be on my person as I work is handy. The quality is excellent, and the sound quality very good. I am pleased with this little radio.
customer_reviews.author: Tom the Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Good little radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio for my sister to replace a small Sony radio that is no longer made. The quality of this radio is much better. Not only can you use it with earbuds but you can also use it without them. The sound quality is very good. She loves this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for biking or walking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio because I had an earlier version that I used for years riding bike, hiking, walking, etc. Always excellent in every respect. At first I thought the new one had to many buttons but once I figured out the lock mechanism I began to like it as much as the original device. I also like being able to listed to the radio without ear plugs sometimes and the time on the face of the device. Good job people! I am not real big on Korean products but this is really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VEry useful portable radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful item. I like that it has both am and fm frequencies, difficult to find these days. I wanted a simple replacement for an old fashioned Walkman and this is it. I use it all the time. In fact, I bought a second one for my upstairs bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Thompson

customer_reviews.title: it's broken barely 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio in Jun and now totally out of order. waste of my money. I even don't know where I can repair it, maybe even not worth to repair
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little electronic marvel. It has excellent reception and has shown a long, useful life. I purchased this to replace an identical model that lasted seven years of constant, nightly use. I wish my bedside radio picked up distant stations as well. Tough to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Bear

customer_reviews.title: An excellent AM/FM small compact powerful radio
customer_reviews.text: An excellent AM/FM small compact powerful radio. I like to use ear buds to listen to Limbaugh on AM stations when staying in Branson and Las Vegas, but with the good speaker this radio allows my wife to listen when she wants to. I had the same radio that also had a wx alert band that we never used. Unfortunately it got washed in my cargo pants' pocket and still played, but not well. I think Sangean puts out the best radios available at very reasonable prices. I also recently purchased their smaller speakerless am/fm radio which is also powerful. Its' clear case is a unique interesting look into modern electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Laredo

customer_reviews.title: Sangean produces quality products
customer_reviews.text: Love this little radio. Well built, frugal with batteries. Sound is solid. As good or better than more expensive options I compared it with. Also have a shower radio by Sangean that has lasted years. Sangean produces quality products.
customer_reviews.author: BPDX

customer_reviews.title: Less than 3 Weeks Old and Malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: Started out OK. Then the tuner became selective about where it would tune to, on-off switch malfunctioned and had to take the batteries out to turn it off, the display worked about half the time so you couldn't tell what station you were tuning to. It would take more time, effort, and money (auto gas, postage, and the value of my time) to send it back than it cost, so now it's in the recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable/Pocket Radio I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little radio, best I've ever used. Bought it primarily to use at live remotes in radio. Cannot say enough about the build quality and signal. I've heard some complaints about battery life, but for me, I've used it more than 16 hours and still haven't changed batteries.
customer_reviews.author: WayneOtis

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! I've had a number of Sangean radios over the years. I've always found Sangean's to have the very best receivers and the DT-200X continues this tradition. The controls on this model are improver over previous versions. There were subtle changes made to the user interface. Even though there are now few buttons, operations like navigating between presets and moving between the preset mode and manual tuning are great. This radio allows you to switch from stereo to mono reception, so reception of weak stations can be greatly improved. This radio costs more than similar product, but it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flich Redham

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone performer
customer_reviews.text: This Sangean Radio is very sensititve on both FM and AM bands. Good selectivity, pulling in weak stations well on both bands. Outstanding headphone quality with FM stereo and bass boost control. Loudspeaker is tinny. This radio is best as a headphone listener
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Sangean I'm used to.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sangean since it was portable and cheap enuf. Based on the quality I'm used to since I currently have three other Sangean radios, this radio sort of let me down. I really haven't got to use it a great amount since receiving it but that was my initial thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing outstanding. 😮
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with only average sound quality with the speaker on AM or FM stations. Much improved on FM using the ear buds. The DBB option is decent with head phones or ear buds. Would not recommend this model overall at this price point. 😔📟
customer_reviews.author: David Weeks

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased 6 over the years
customer_reviews.text: They've all failed the same way. The volume control is the weak component on this unit. I originally prioritized its ability to lock on to weak signals. Now I just want something that is dependable. This is not that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic radio! Great sound for such a small size. Love the 90 minute shutoff feature, so I can listen to it as I fall asleep and not leave it on all night. I can't say enough good things about this radio!
customer_reviews.author: nyfan

customer_reviews.title: ... bought several other units that had no reception and poor sound but this one works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought several other units that had no reception and poor sound but this one works great. Great reception and great sound plus user friendly features like one place to collect all your frequently used channels so you can click through them easily to find what you want to listen to. Like the Guy Clark song says "Stuff that Works." This unit works great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: This one is great also but notice it doesn't have the reception as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Sangean transistor radio that I've had throughout the years. My last one was taped together with duck tape from all the times that I dropped it. But the on and off button finally gave out. This one is great also but notice it doesn't have the reception as all the rest that I've bought but it's still a great little radio.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, great reception.
customer_reviews.text: If you've been using whatever generic unit that Best Buy currently offers, it is time to step up to something with a decent build quality. Unlike some other reviewers, I haven't used some of the other high end units so I can't compare it to them. The clarity of the signal, the bright display and the compact size make it far better than any of the other cheap units I have used. The one pain, though, is the automatic 90 minute shut-off timer. There should be an easy way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cornerstone

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little unit. It's the perfect radio to carry around in your pocket. It's easy on batteries and easy to use. I listen mostly with earbuds, but the built-in speaker comes in handy sometimes, especially for sharing with another listener. Nice sound, and pulls in the stations very well. I particulary like the "lock" feature, which prevents you from changing the station accidentally while moving around. The radio is a tad heavier than I expected, but that's a reasonable tradeoff for the high quality. The unit automaticlly turns off after 90 minutes unless you choose to defeat this feature. Great for falling asleep and saving battery life. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: DIGITAL TUNING FAVORITE STATIONS WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to breaking this one and buying another one. Sounds goofy, but I LOVE this product. The speaker is tinny and so-so. What is good are the earbuds. The sound is terrific and FM reception is excellent. AM too. It's HEAVY for its size and before long its weak switches may break, but that's product design. You'll buy another in a year or two. Very happy with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: An excellent radio for one on the go
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and most amazed with this radio. Not only can I use headphones, but a speaker as well. With the additional antenna, I can receieve AM stations and the quality of transmission is great. The radio is intelligently designed, with controls in logical places for one's hands. The construction of the unit is sound. The features are all comprensible, and the functionality is sound. The radio has excellent receiving qualities, particularly in an area of competing broadcasts: NE. For radio enthusiasts, this is a sound product that offers hours of radio entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: nyc2gf

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: The make of the radio was solid, but I didn't like the sound, so I sent it back. I ended up getting the Sangean DT-210, which had a fuller sound. The sound was kind of tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Momof6

customer_reviews.title: Conked out after it needed new batteries
customer_reviews.text: Buttons not in good position, when clipped to pants, movement would turn off radio. Not a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: No regrets here....
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Have had for long time now. Great battery life. Really like it has clock time display. Has better reception than my Sangean DT-180. Removing batts does not lose settings. Only con is I have yet to figure out how to delete a preset station. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good enough I guess.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace an identical one I had for years which would no longer transmit through the ear buds reliably. It does not, however, show the exact station numbers on the am dial. 800 am is 801; 1520 am is 1501; there is no 1000 am, it jumps from 999 to 1008. It's a little annoying but I have adjusted to it. I like the small size and for a radio of such size, the stations are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bird

customer_reviews.title: Durable and programmable
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these over the years and given them heavy use. The DT-200X pulls down stations well, as it's supposed to. Key features that keep me coming back include stereo/mono mode, key lock, 19 station presets available, clock, and a built-in speaker that I use occasionally, but is not usually found in a radio of this size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Field Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Radio
customer_reviews.text: Had an earlier similar version that also had a TV band. This is a good emergency/ general purpose radio. Just bought one for my husband. We live in the NY metro area and at night receive signals from Canada (love AM 900 CHML...love their Old Time Radio Programing) to the north the Carolina's to the south and even Chicago. Local reception is excellent and this radio was terrific after during and after Superstorm Sandy and other occasions when we lost power for many days. Best things if you use it at night has a 90 minute shutoff, has many presets, is lightweight and depending on the type of headset excellent stereo reception on FM.
customer_reviews.author: GZG

customer_reviews.title: When I read the reviews from people complaining about this I have to wonder if they have had a similar radio with great reception everywhere they walk
customer_reviews.text: Reception varies with location-but what doesn't? This works well in my home and yard but not the grocery store a9wish it did). When I read the reviews from people complaining about this I have to wonder if they have had a similar radio with great reception everywhere they walk. the shape of this makes it so it is difficult for the clip to work well-it really doesn't. I would give it a 5 if the reception was excellent, and it is only good and if it easily clipped to your pants. for price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen P

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile buy with one minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Although its a bit pricey compared to many models you can get at your local department store it has some really great features. Being digital, the station setting doesn't drift with temperature like my old unit. I love the "lock" switch that locks all the settings (except volume). Setting the station memory function isn't exactly intuitive so you'll need to refer to the manual. Sound quality is acceptable except that, when using headphones especially, the base is accentuated to the point that speech (like talk radio) sounds muffled. All in all, a great little radio.
customer_reviews.author: FredL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Terrific portable radio. Often I use the radio to help me fall asleep at night. The sleep timer saves battery life by shutting down after 90 minutes. I use fewer batteries than my old radio, which was a well-advertised brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Radio
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger Sangean tabletop radio which is excellent. I wanted a small radio and this exceeded my expectations! Crystal clear, easy to operate, Sangean quality and fantastic sound in such a small radio. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: anadux

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket radio
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sangean radio, my first being the standard WR with analog tuner. I wanted something to listen to at work and the DT-200x is great for that. Good reception, very easy to use buttons and good features. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SMALL POCKET RADIO - BAR NONE
customer_reviews.text: I love radios and I listen to them far more than I watch television. This radio exceeds my expectations and is superior to any small radio I have ever owned or tried. The radio's tuner is fantastic. The build quality is superb. It feels solid and the controls all feel well designed. The speaker sounds great for it's size. The display is easy to understand with plenty of information. The battery life blows all my other radios away. It has all the right features. I give this radio my highest recommendation and FIVE STARS...you won't go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Good quality radio
customer_reviews.text: Sangean has always made some of the best quality radios I have ever used. I have been a radio enthusiast over the last 20 years .
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a DT-200X... it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a DT-200X...it is a DT-200VX...so stop upping the price by deception!!! I know what you're trying to do here! A DT-200X is very sought after within the paranormal field; and that's why you keep saying it's a 200x insteand of 200vx; which if you zoom in, it's CLEARLY a 200vx. Stop before I report this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price even though it is a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: This radio is a cheap price and cheap quality. Have not had it that long and now we have to hit it sometimes to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: market garden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio and built well.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this radio. I use it at work where I could never get any decent reception. Now I can get even Am stations. Works great. I love the fact it turns off automatically at 90 minutes to save the battery. IT also has a great lock feature that you can set so the channel does not change by mistake. Nice digital display as well. I highly recommend this radio. Love it. I am using different ear buds though. The ones that came with it I found too large for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep radio
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to locate and use stations. Only found two stations on one band and perhaps 12 on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Palbicke

customer_reviews.title: Can't get all stations
customer_reviews.text: The fm stations are hard to get. The hardest is the one I like most and is a strong station
customer_reviews.author: reader from newton, ma

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good radio for the price. Headphones are actually pretty good and I like the lock feature. Wish i had purchased the emergency alert version. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi q

customer_reviews.title: Sangean Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Sangean pocket radio, the first one lasted 6-7 years before the battery compartment wiring corroded from a leaking battery. This new unit features new features, like the backlight and more memory, than the previous DT100 model. It should hopefully last as long as the last one. The only concern is the switch to Digital TV in February, I imagine we will lose the TV reception. That is too bad, as my wife uses it to listen to Letterman and the late shows with a pillow speaker. I dropped a star (4 out of 5) due to Sangean not addressing this issue which is scheduled in just three months.
customer_reviews.author: SeaBear

customer_reviews.title: Great AM/FM sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the radio. It's AM/FM and has a digital read out. It has a stereo switch for FM listening. This radio has great sound and great signal strength for AM.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hicks

customer_reviews.title: it is probably the best radio for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these that I bought and the reviews don't lie, it is probably the best radio for your money. Well designed and thoughtful features like auto off and speaker. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: slim

customer_reviews.title: This little radio shines.  I have tried many!
customer_reviews.text: Its sound is good; small, fits in my pocket when walking, like the fact that it automatically turns off after an hour...just in case I forget...great little radio for a modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Portable digital radio
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable radio that got good reception where I live. I also wanted something digital so I wouldn't have to constantly be tweaking the frequency. This radio fits the bill and the reception is very good. I live in a poor area for radio reception and this radio works extremely well. The only issue I had was getting familiar with the preset function as it was a little different that what I was used to.I would recommend this to anyone who likes to listen to the radio while they walk or jog.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C. Howden

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Very good reception, well made, small but has a little weight to it. Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND P SULICH JR

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Only complaint is that the belt clip is not too secure with running shorts. Batteries last a loong time and the auto off feature is great as i often forget to shut it off. The auto off can be deactivated by holding the power button on 3-5 seconds while powering on. Excellent reception in NYC area
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Like It But Sending Back
customer_reviews.text: There is supposed to be a belt clip with the radio. This package was missing it. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Ktm

customer_reviews.title: love this little gem!
customer_reviews.text: My first one of these lasted almost 5 years, and it got daily use. Yesterday it finally died so I just ordered a new one. I was glad to see they have the exact same one-love it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT job accompaniment
customer_reviews.text: I do house cleaning, and this little gem just stays with me and keeps me company while I'm cleaning and scrubbing. The belt clip clips on my t-shirt collar just perfectly so I can hear it whatever I'm doing. The ONLY drawback is the 1-1/2 hour auto SHUT OFF. I realize why they engineered that feature, but when I'm cleaning a house that takes 3 hours, it seems it shuts off at the WRONG part, and I'm having to fiddle with turning it back ON. Otherwise I am extremely happy with this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Schuette

customer_reviews.title: Sangeon quality, not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bot used, no antenna, so dug up old speaker wire and I'm good
customer_reviews.author: M. Krewski

customer_reviews.title: Sangean DT-200X
customer_reviews.text: I already have a different Sangean radio. After reading the different reviews I decided to get this for my wife ( Feeling guilty since I already had two Yellow versions of these make radios) . My first one finally quit on me after a number of five foot falls on to the bath room tile floors! Wonder why???. She seems to be well pleased with the radio. I haven't been able to try it out. You might can understand why. It's Hers!
customer_reviews.author: missisiptom

customer_reviews.title: ... quality of the stereo through the buds isn't as good my old Tecsun
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stereo through the buds isn't as good my old Tecsun. Don't depend on the clock. Sometimes the numbers and letters on the digital readout disappears. But for what I need it for, like walks and carrying around a light radio, it works. Reception very good and programmed stations nice. Would I buy again, maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jamvold

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance', she was looking for a pocket radio to listen to classical music if she has a difficult time falling asleep because of my snoring. This seems to be a very good quality product. It looks and functions very well. The little light on the display is very helpful at night. We are both very pleased with this purchase, and would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Best mini AM/FM radio ever
customer_reviews.text: I have several............they are great and get stations in that on other radios are just barely working! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne A

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this which is still working. I wanted to get this one because I was hoping it would get more stations and have better reception...which it does! I am glad I up-graded to this one!!! I like every thing about it like adjusting the volume easier, having a lighted dial, etc. The only thing I do not like is the case. It seems cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: hasband won't leave it alone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, an avid sports fan who listens to a local AM sports station. Now, when he walks around the house he has the radio attached to his pocket because the station never fades in and out. Also, he has taken the radio with him when we have gone farther from home and his station. Usually the station would not come in at all. This time it did and it was crystal clear. The lock botton is also an added feature that keeps the radio tuned to our favorite station. This is a wonderful radio and I have ordered me my own.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It sounds better and locks into stations better than a phone radio (which are increasingly rare in phones). The physical interface is well thought-out (the control lock, the station memory, etc.). Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Quality of sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great radio and good sound in a small package. Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: William D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sangean DT200VX
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, pleasantly surprised. Case is metal ( not plastic) and size is just right for pocket use. The speaker is adequate and ear buds work fine. I find I need the aerial wire to get certain stations, but overall not a problem. I like the 90 min time out feature. I have not had to change batteries yet. The instructions were a little cryptic, but adeqwuate. Everything appears to work as advertised. I have not used the TV audio feature. Depending on your needs, this is a great general purpose AM/FM pocket radio that is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kiesewetter

customer_reviews.title: This company makes top of the line radios.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using sangean for year. It's the only radio brand I buy. Because the reception is extremely sensitive. This little radio I take with me everywhere. The speaker has good sound. And good battery life. Sangean radios that come with an antenna have an inherent flaw if you constantly wheel the antenna around you will break the fragile connection that it has with the radio,and won't be able to receive any stations.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mistretta

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a pocket size radio.
customer_reviews.text: My second Sangean. Left my first one in a hotel room. This one drops the TV tune option which is good. Works great for a pocket size radio.
customer_reviews.author: James Price Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Can't store channels
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to store a station to your favorites. Why have a favorites button then?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Only picked up a few stations and they were very weak
customer_reviews.author: Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Radio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio for listening to TV audio. I enjoy listening to TV news in the morning and evening. Warning! Effective February 2009 all TV analog transmission will stop. Only digital TV transmission will be available. No more analog TV audio. What a disappointment. If TV audio is not important to you the radio is great. I enjoyed listening to AM/FM radio. The radio is made of good plastic material. Battery life is better than previous Sangean models. Pro: Nice small radio Con: No digital TV Tuner
customer_reviews.author: S. Ng

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RECEPTION IN AM AND FM , AND THE BATTERIES CAN BE CHANGED OUT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT RECEPTION IN AM AND FM , AND THE BATTERIES CAN BE CHANGED OUT , I DO NOT CARE FOR RECHARGEABLES , ALWAYS A HASTLE TO BRING IT IN AND PLUG IT IN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved reception even in hilly areas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Sangean DT200V which I've had for years. The earphone plug in became loose so only one channel could be heard. The reception of the 200x is much improved. Signal does not fade at the bottom of hills. Controls are almost identical to DT200V.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Paik

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I can use this radio virtually anywhere. I wouldn't trust another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B. King

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I would turn it into a ghost box. However, about a year ago the original digital tuner chip went obsolete, which had the capability to disable the mute while scanning, allowing it to become a ghost box. The new chipset does not allow it to be bypassed as easily. I am playing with it to see if I can determine how to make it do what I want. If I figure it out, I will post it online somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JB in tucson

customer_reviews.title: Good Reception
customer_reviews.text: The DT-200X has excellent reception on AM and FM on certain stations it simply requires moving the receiver to receive the best Stereo performance. I'm not completely satisfied with the memory presets since it requires to cycle through all the presets in order to tune the desired station. The included headphones have very poor fidelity suggest replacing with aftermarket In Ear Monitors for best performance.
customer_reviews.author: Hifimiami

customer_reviews.title: (MUCH BETTER THAN FOUR OTHER TRANSISTOR TYPE RADIOS) (THAT I HAVE ...
customer_reviews.text: (MUCH BETTER THAN FOUR OTHER TRANSISTOR TYPE RADIOS) (THAT I HAVE BOUGHT RECENTLY) (INCLUDING SONY) (STILL HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FIGURE OUT MEMORY FUNCTION) (PLEASE RECOMMEND WATERPROOF CARRYING CASE)
customer_reviews.author: duane hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Sangean DT200VX AM/FM/TV Radio
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've bought several of these from CC Radio. I like the lighted dial & battery indicator. The ear 'buds' are terrible! They don't 'stay' in the ears & they are very fragile. My buds broke off after a few uses. The older ear sets were much better! The forward & back "button" was one piece, I prefer the distinct buttons, especially @ night. All in all, this is still my favorite pocket radio. This model has been discontinued @ CC Radio & replaced w/ more expensive model. I was very pleased Amazon still offers this excellent radio!
customer_reviews.author: Cec Wood

customer_reviews.title: For a compact quality radio consider this one.
customer_reviews.text: Crisp digital tunning and controls, solid housing. Ear buds provided are mmmmm, but with good ear buds you end up with a nice sound. Speaker is ok for it's small size. AM reception is quite good, FM at times is spotty but could be my area. I don't think this is a good choice for jogging, you would have to hold it or keep it in a pocket. This radio is a level above most compact radios(2 1/2" x 4") and I really think it is worth the extra green backs.
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: This unit is without a doubt the best pocket radio I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I bought a little pocket radio. My last one was a Memorex arm band radio that had a difficult user interface. I always had a cheap transistor radio when I was a boy. This unit is without a doubt the best pocket radio I have ever owned. I love the simple digital tuning, presets, and awesome clear reception. Best used with headphones. The built in speaker sounds a bit distorted, but sound is 10x better with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: 2Son xRunner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio
customer_reviews.text: I love my little radio. It fits so well on my pocket and the battery life is truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: mark t barnhardt

customer_reviews.title: This is his favorite of all time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely LOVES it! He listens to radio a lot each day with a portable device and headphones, and has for years. This is his favorite of all time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Janssen

product_meta.title: Sangean DT-200X FM-Stereo/AM Digital Tuning Pocket Radio
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER





Simple quality, simple to use functions, and simply great design. Keep up-to-date on the latest news, weather, traffic, sports scores, and much more with this ultra-portable pocket radio from Sangean.

POCKET-SIZED
The DT-200X is a small PLL-synthesized AM/FM stereo radio that's small enough to fit in a shirt or jacket pocket, and powerful enough to pull in those distant AM/FM stations. It measures a mere 2.5 by 4.2 by 1.2 inches, and weighs only 3.8 ounces, making it portable enough to take anywhere.



Portable enough to take anywhere

BIG FEATURES
You get 19 memory presets (and auto scan), plus a My Favorite Stations feature to help you zip right to preferred stations. The radio comes with stereo earbuds and a removable belt clip, as well as a trailing antenna. A stereo-mono switch improves reception when needed, and the built-in speaker affords headphones-free listening.

With Phase Loop Lock Digital Tuning and Sangean's traditional radio sensitivity, built-in speaker and included earbuds, you will be able to enjoy your morning jog, your short trip to the beach, or other outing without missing your favorite AM/FM station if you have the DT-200X pocket radio.

BATTERY POWERED WITH AUTO SHUT-OFF
The Sangean DT-200X runs on two AA batteries (not included). A low-battery indicator on the LCD display offers a helpful hint on when it's wise to carry replacements. 90-minute auto shut-off lets you fall asleep to the radio without fear of waking up to dead batteries.
feature_bullets: Am/ FM-Stereo pocket radio with drift-free PLL Synthesized tuner and built-in speaker
19 radom AM/FM memory presets with Auto station Scanning and auto seek

Large backlit LCD display, selectable stereo/mono switch, stereo headphone output, low battery indicator, 90 minute auto shut off, DBB dynamic bass boost, lock switch, My favorite stations and real time clock
Removable belt clip, stereo earbuds, trailing antenna included
High-impact ABS case measures just 4. 2”H x 2. 5”W x . 75”D inches
Drift-free, PLL synthesized tuning, 19 FM/AM memory presets with auto station scanning
Removable belt clip, stereo ear buds, trailing antenna included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars910 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
